---
id: pluck
---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## pluck() function

제공된 Iterable/AsyncIterable의 모든 객체에서 동일한 이름의 속성을 추출하여 Iterable/AsyncIterable을 반환합니다.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function pluck<O extends object, K extends keyof O>(
  key: K,
  iterable: Iterable<O>,
): IterableIterator<O[K]>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iter = pluck("age", [{ age: 21 }, { age: 22 }, { age: 23 }]);
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 21}
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 22}
iter.next(); // {done:false, value: 23}

// with pipe
pipe([{ age: 21 }, { age: 22 }, { age: 23 }], pluck("age"), toArray); // [21, 22 ,23]

// if you want to use asynchronous callback
await pipe(
  Promise.resolve([{ age: 21 }, { age: 22 }, { age: 23 }]),
  toAsync,
  pluck("age"),
  toArray,
); // [21, 22 ,23]

// with toAsync
await pipe(
  [
    Promise.resolve({ age: 21 }),
    Promise.resolve({ age: 22 }),
    Promise.resolve({ age: 23 }),
  ],
  toAsync,
  pluck("age"),
  toArray,
); // [21, 22 ,23]
```

see [pipe](https://fxts.dev/ko/api/pipe)<!-- -->, [toAsync](https://fxts.dev/ko/api/toAsync)<!-- -->, [toArray](https://fxts.dev/ko/api/toArray)

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/Lazy/pluck.ts)
